```{r}
# installation 
install.packages("daltoolbox")

# loading DAL
library(daltoolbox) 
```

```{r}
data(sin_data)
x <- sin_data$x
y <- sin_data$y
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
plot_ts(x=x, y=y) + theme(text = element_text(size=16))
```

```{r}
data <- ts_data(y)
ts_head(data)
plot_ts(y=data[,1]) + theme(text = element_text(size=16))
```

```{r}
data10 <- ts_data(y, 10)
ts_head(data10)
```

```{r}
r1 <- data10[12,]
r1
```

```{r}
r2 <- data10[12:13,]
r2
```

```{r}
c1 <- data10[,1]
ts_head(c1)
```

```{r}
c2 <- data10[,1:2]
ts_head(c2)
```

```{r}
rc1 <- data10[12:13,1:2]
rc1
```

```{r}
rc2 <- data10[12,1:2]
rc2
```

```{r}
rc3 <- data10[12:13,1]
rc3
```

```{r}
rc4 <- data10[12,1]
rc4
```
